attributes.action: Shorten the school hours, due to student stress, and tiredness.
attributes.additional_details: Students are having problems learning because of stress and pressure put on them. Waking up early effects on how students learn.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Limit secondary schools days to 5.5 hours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612366

Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
